ivory.ffg.stats
Class GlobalStats

java.lang.Object
  ivory.ffg.stats.GlobalStats

public class GlobalStats
extends Object

Global statistics used in computing features (e.g., idf and cf)

Author:
Nima Asadi

Constructor Detail

GlobalStats

public GlobalStats(HMapIF idf,
                   HMapIF cf,
                   int documentCount,
                   long collectionLength,
                   float avgDocumentLength,
                   float defaultDf,
                   float defaultCf)
Creates an instance of this class with the provided information

Parameters:
idf - Map of term ids to IDF values
cf - Map of term ids to Collection Frequency (CF) values
documentCount - Number of documents in the collection
collectionLength - Length of the collection (i.e., number of terms)
avgDocumentLength - Average length of documents (i.e., average number of term per document
defaultDf - Default value for document frequency (used for phrase queries)
defaultCf - Default value for collection frequency (used for phrase queries)
